chapters.title: Chapter 3:  Practice
chapters.info: Alanna Mosvani, p. 59—One of the Accepted. She is shy, but she works hard at being fierce. She wants to be a Green and have a dozen Warders. She is always exaggerating. At the meeting where Tamra announced her plan for the bounty, she asked if the Accepted would be allowed to defend themselves with the One Power. The answer was no.
